title: Living with COVID-19: vaccination and personal responsibility
author: Allison Imrie
description: The world changed for us at the beginning of 2020 with emergence of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the disease COVID-19. Almost two years since the global pandemic was declared in March 2020 many people are still learning to live with this virus and to accept that vaccination is fundamental for control of severe disease.
